scripts.compile: mkdir -p lib/js && ./node_modules/bs-platform/bin/bsc.exe -I lib/ocaml -c -bs-main lib/ocaml/jquery.ml -bs-package-name $npm_package_name -bs-package-output lib/js || true
scripts.compile_test: mkdir -p lib/js && ./node_modules/bs-platform/bin/bsc.exe -I lib/ocaml -c -bs-main lib/ocaml/test.ml -bs-package-name $npm_package_name -bs-package-output lib/js || true
